title: North East Line service disruption due to track fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 东北线轨道故障导致服务中断
title_translations.ms: Gangguan perkhidmatan Laluan Timur Laut akibat kerosakan trek
title_translations.ta: தடக் கோளாறு காரணமாக வடகிழக்கு வரிசையில் சேவை தடைப்பட்டது

updates.text: 19/07, 9.24am: NEL Svc has resumed. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.
19/07, 9.01am: NEL svc is delayed due to a track fault at Harbourfront Stn. Additional travel time of 5 to 10 mins is expected for both directions.
19/07, 8.32am: NEL Svc is delayed due to a track fault at Harbourfront Stn. Additional travel time of 15 mins is expected for both directions. We are sorry
19/07, 8.20am: NEL Svc is delayed due to a track fault at Harbourfront Stn. Additional travel time abt 10mins is expected for both directions. We are sorry
19/07, 8.10am: NEL Svc is delayed due to a track fault at Harbourfront Stn. Additional travel time of abt 5mins is expected for both directions.  We are sorry.
